messages.alphaNum: The {{input}} field may only contain letters and numbers
messages.ascii: The {{input}} field may only contain ASCII characters
messages.base32: The {{input}} field must be base32 encoded

messages.boolean: The {{input}} field must be a boolean

messages.object: The {{input}} field must be a object

messages.string: The {{input}} field must be a string
messages.undefined: The {{input}} field must be an undefined

messages.url: The {{input}} field must be a valid url
messages.max: The {{input}} field must be less than or equal to given number
messages.min: The {{input}} field must be more than or equal to given number
